desc: 测试查询出差本表、子表的案例
name: SelectTravelSelfDetailStar

oqls.desc: 根据ID查询出差（含行程记录ID列表）记录
oqls.name: SelectTravelAndTripIdsById
oqls.oql: select *, trips from Travel where applyId = '434743DSS-FEL3232-323KLFJFDS-323FDSD'
oqls.sql: select APPLY_ID, APPLY_NAME, START_DATE, END_DATE, REASON, ATTACH_NAMES, ATTACH_KEYS, CREATOR_NAME, CREATOR_KEY, CREATED_AT, MODIFIER_NAME, MODIFIER_KEY, MODIFIED_AT, OWNER_KEY, REVISION, DELETED from TRAVEL where APPLY_ID = '434743DSS-FEL3232-323KLFJFDS-323FDSD'
oqls.detailSql: select TRIP_ID from TRAVEL_TRIP where TRAVEL_APPLY_ID = #{travelApplyId}

oqls.desc: 根据ID查询出差（含行程）记录
oqls.name: SelectTravelAndTripById
oqls.oql: select *, trips.* from Travel where applyId = '434743DSS-FEL3232-323KLFJFDS-323FDSD'
